CatDescriptText: Cutline of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 30, 1947, pg. 21 reads: "...the Loendi Club of Pittsburgh will commemorate a half century of progress at its fiftieth anniversary celebration in Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall Sunday, Sept. 7, at 3 p.m."
TitMainTitle: Men, women, and a child gathered on balcony of Loendi Club decorated with American flag bunting and sign reading "50th Anniversary"
